question: Who among the following was the original scribe of the Guru Granth Sahib?
explanation: Bhai Gurdas was an historian and preache, writer. He was considered the original scribe of the Guru Granth Sahib. He also served as the first Jathedar of Akal Takht. The Akal Takht was built by Shri Guru Hargobind which is located at Amritsar, Punjab.
